categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: The Jedi Knight Jaina Solo infiltrated the headquarters of Onadax Droid Technologies in 28 ABY. The company has manufactured a Human replica droid that betrayed the citizens of Bakura, and Solo hopes to bring them to justice for the crimes that their clients commit. After sneaking past several Jenet security guards, she confronted Stanton Rendar, but he loosed several battle droids on her which gave Stanton time to escape.
